sectionText: This section meets with LAW 794.  A limited number of seats will be open to select Graduate Engineering students.  If you are interested, students should apply with a brief CV and a short statement (3-4 sentences) of the reason for their interest in this course to Professor Somaya at dsomaya@illinois.edu.  This course will open to PSM students on Monday, November 28, 2016 at 9:00 a.m.
